What are the treatments for atypical hemolytic-uremic syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of atypical hemolytic-uremic syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Atypical Hemolytic-Uremic Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Atypical hemolytic uremi
